```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)

data_run_2 <- read_excel("data/data.run.2.xlsx")

data_run_2 %>%
   pivot_longer(c(lac.max)) %>%
  select(Timepoint, FP, lac.max) %>%
    group_by(Timepoint) %>%
    summarise(lac = sd(lac.max),
                 te = lac / sqrt(2))
```
